overview: Fletch is a fish out of water in small-town Louisiana, where he's checking out a tumbledown mansion he's inherited. When a woman he flirts with turns up dead, he becomes a suspect and must find the killer and clear his name.
tagline: When there's more trouble than one man can handle...there's more than one man for the job.
cast: Chevy Chase|Hal Holbrook|Julianne Phillips|R. Lee Ermey|Richard Libertini
